greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A261236(n) - A261237(n).
mathematica: Table[Length@ # - 2 First@ FirstPosition[#, k_ /; k != 2] + 1 &@ Map[First@ IntegerDigits[#, 3] &, #] &@ NestWhileList[# - Total@ IntegerDigits[#, 3] &, 3^(n + 1) - 1, # > 3^n - 1 &], {n, 0, 16}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 27 2016, Version 10 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 16 2015
ext: Terms a(24) & a(25) from _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 27 2016
